Issue.creator: iridescent995
Issue.summary: Is there a way to install java chaincode directly as a jar in hyperledger fabric v1.3 without exposing the source code?
Issue.description: While instantiating a java chaincode, hyperledger fabric v1.3 uses the source code, builds it, creates a container and a chaincode.jar (in first-network) in it. Is there a way to do all this directly without exposing the source code.?
